original: @133b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @133b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened Buddha, the King of the Lunar Mansions, the Constellations, and the Moments.🔽Tadyathā:

original: me sa mi ta dha ni /
analyzed: me sa mi ta dha ni /

original: de'i cho ga ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'dod kyang rung ste des lan bdun brjod nas song na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i cho ga ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'dod kyang rung ste des lan bdun brjod nas song na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: As for its ritual, wherever one wishes to go, if one goes there having recited it seven times, all aims will be accomplished.

original: don thams cad 'grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: don thams cad 'grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Accomplishing All Aims is complete.
